statements: SELECT id, name, coordinates FROM spatial_data;
SELECT name, id, coordinates FROM spatial_data;
SELECT coordinates, name, id FROM spatial_data;
SELECT * FROM spatial_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name FROM spatial_data WHERE id = 2;
SELECT id, name, coordinates FROM spatial_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM spatial_data WHERE name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name, coordinates FROM spatial_data WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT TOP 3 id, name, ST_AsText(coordinates) AS formatted_coordinates FROM spatial_data WHERE name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, name, ST_X(coordinates) AS latitude, ST_Y(coordinates) AS longitude FROM spatial_data WHERE ST_DWithin(coordinates, ST_GeogFromText('POINT(0 0)'), 1000);
SELECT * FROM points;
SELECT id, name FROM points;
SELECT name, coordinates FROM points ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM points WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name, coordinates FROM points WHERE name LIKE '%A%';
SELECT name, id, coordinates FROM points WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, id, coordinates FROM points WHERE name LIKE '%A%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, name, AsText(coordinates) AS coord_text FROM points WHERE ST_Within(coordinates, (SELECT shape FROM polygons WHERE name = 'Square'));
SELECT id, name, SHAPE_AREA(shape) AS area FROM polygons WHERE SHAPE_AREA(shape) > 1000;
SELECT p.name AS point_name, py.name AS polygon_name FROM points p INNER JOIN polygons py ON ST_Contains(py.shape, p.coordinates);
SELECT * FROM points;
SELECT id, name FROM lines WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name, ST_AsText(coordinates) AS coordinates_text FROM points WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM polygons WHERE id >= 5 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, ST_Area(area) AS area FROM polygons WHERE id IN (3, 7);
SELECT id, name, coordinates FROM points WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM points WHERE name LIKE '%A%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM lines WHERE ST_Length(geometry) > 100 ORDER BY name ASC, id DESC;
SELECT name, ST_Area(area) AS polygon_area FROM polygons WHERE id < 10 GROUP BY name ORDER BY polygon_area DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT id, name FROM points WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5, 7, 9);
SELECT * FROM points ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name, coordinates FROM lines WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, name FROM polygons WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM spatial_data WHERE feature_type = 'point';
SELECT name, ST_AsText(coordinates) AS coords FROM points WHERE name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, name, ST_AsText(coordinates) FROM points WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM lines WHERE name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, name, ST_X(coordinates) AS x_coord, ST_Y(coordinates) AS y_coord FROM polygons WHERE id < 10;
SELECT id, feature_type, ST_Area(coordinates) AS area FROM spatial_data WHERE feature_type = 'polygon';
SELECT id, name, ST_Distance(coordinates, ST_GeomFromText('POINT(10 20)')) AS distance FROM points ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT * FROM points;
SELECT name, coordinates FROM points WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name FROM polygons ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE latitude > 0 AND longitude < 0;
SELECT feature_name FROM features WHERE feature_type = 'landmark';
SELECT * FROM points WHERE name = 'Point A';
SELECT id, name FROM lines WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name, ST_AsText(coordinates) AS coordinates_text FROM points WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM polygons WHERE ST_Area(boundary) > 1000;
SELECT feature_name, feature_type FROM features WHERE feature_type IN ('Type1', 'Type2') ORDER BY feature_name ASC;
